Member Function Documentation

void Alaris.Core.AlarisPacket.Dispose (  ) 

Releases all resource used by the Alaris.Core.AlarisPacket object.

Call Dispose when you are finished using the Alaris.Core.AlarisPacket. The Dispose method leaves the Alaris.Core.AlarisPacket in an unusable state. After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the Alaris.Core.AlarisPacket so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the Alaris.Core.AlarisPacket was occupying.
